  freestar.queue = freestar.queue || [];
  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

</a></div><div style="clear:both;"></div></div><div><sup>Sponsored</sup></div></div><div class="cell show-for-medium medium-6" style="padding: 0.6rem;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="60388" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="60388" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.99</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="664">664</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="90"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>California Dream</b> by <b>Louis Vuitton</b> is a Citrus fragrance for women and men. <b>California Dream</b> was launched in 2020. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Les Colognes Louis Vuitton is a line in the Les Parfums Louis Vuitton Collection that contains fresh cologne-like scents but in EDP concentration, inspired by L.A. and a sense of freedom.</p>

<p>California Dream, with citrusy and warm oriental notes captures the sunset in a bottle, the sky above LA and the mood of this city. It contains notes of mandarin, pear, musk as well as ambrette seed and benzoin. The perfumer's idea was to contrast the explosive freshness with the softer notes, as the warmth surrounding the cool tones.</p>

<p>The colors of the bottle and the packaging are designed by LA artist Alex Israel under the name "Sky Backdrop". The fragrance is available as a 100 and a200 ml Eau de Parfum.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a                             <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">8</span></div>

                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">

                    </div>

Smells like many other LV frags but simplified, paired down. Performance isnt as good as others in the line. Its a basic citrus musk, which there are plenty of similar frags that can be bought for a fraction of the price. For this price point I expect more, something at least a little special and with better performance, so its a 3.5/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="2313281"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=2313281#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2262140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708874">BisherHammash</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-30">05/30/24 21:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If Tygar or Vibrato had a Leau/Cologne version.<br />
<br />
Gorgeous stuff</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="2173008"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=2173008#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2126264" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="talkaboutscents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1079076.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="talkaboutscents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2126264ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2126264" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1079076">talkaboutscents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-16">04/16/24 06:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like a half-baked blend of D&amp;G Light Blue for women, Mugler Cologne and Dior Homme Cologne. Iso E Super and Ambroxan, with tons of white musks (guessing some of which are captives), freshened up with citruses and minute amount touches of other things, kind of like the backbone of Mugler Cologne musks, also flashes of Dior Homme Cologne comes to mind but lacking green tangy zesty ginger and lime and instead this having a mellow mandarine and neroli. What you end up with is a pleasant scent but at this level of pricing I find it quite hard to justify.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="2126264"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=2126264#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2124542" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; To me, this one comes off almost like the scent of a lightly sweetened sand. Like Pacific Chill, it is very underwhelming.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="2124542"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=2124542#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2067038" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2067038" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jayvi123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2023757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2023757.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="jayvi123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Feve-Delicieuse-30164.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30164.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fve Dlicieuse"title="Fve Dlicieuse"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2067038ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2067038" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2023757">jayvi123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-19">02/19/24 07:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is fairly synthetic however if you let it dry down and develop on your skin, the mandarin starts to open up really well and starts to feel less synthetic for sure, as it dries down further there is this creamy musk as another review aforementioned and couldn't be more accurate. <br />
<br />
Overall, a great perfume for a summer date night or day out by the beach without offending anyone at all. Yet performance is moderate and is unfortunately over priced.<br />
<br />
Would personally recommend purchasing a decant of this for the situations youd use it in above as a full bottle is simply not worth it.<br />
7.4/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="2067038"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=2067038#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2066211" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2066211" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tgirl1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tgirl1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Favourite"title="The Favourite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2066211ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2066211" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828">tgirl1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-18">02/18/24 10:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like some of the other LV fragrances but this just smells like a bunch of different artificial smells to me. It smells like artificial citrus, artificial powder, artificial sweet. The sillage is kind of interesting because I find that it comes and goes and I'm not exactly clear as to why that happens. It could be that it sits on the skin instead of absorbs, so if you're near, say, wind, it will literally blow up from the surface of your skin. Overall, it's not terrible, but considering the price point, it's very generic and artificial and there are so many other fragrances out their that do a much better job across the board of truly accomplishing anything, whether you're going for uniqueness, longevity, sophistication, not-artificial authenticity. I think there are similar scents of similar quality from Zara and Zara is a tenth of the price. Like maybe it's not the same smell, but you'd probably accomplish the same thing with Golden Decade or Majestic Silver.<br />
<br />
Scent Description: Artificial Sweet Citrus<br />
Sillage: Fair - can smell a short distance<br />
Longevity: Depends on the quantity you spray: more is more for this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="2066211"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=2066211#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2059401" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2059401" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karinavi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898071"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898071.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karinavi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2059401ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2059401" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1026554">tiana360</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 03:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with a juicy orange zest. It does mellow out shortly after, and I feel that its possibly the pear bridging the gap between the orange and musk. The opening is truly addictive. The dry down is soft and borders creamy, but never in a sweet edible way for me. This is definitely unisex, but it does lean very very slightly feminine. Longevity issues as with most LV freshies, but it does cling longer onto clothing. This will be my summer anthem this year, but I would not repurchase the refill.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1994821"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1994821#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978626" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1891069" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frederickf_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frederickf_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1891069ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1891069" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378157">frederickf_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-31">07/31/23 09:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like sherbet ice cream or an expensive gelato. Im more of a coffee guy but I like this. Dry down segues into more of a creamy floral orange, coming a bit away from the intense citrusy top which is nice. Its classy and likable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1891069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1891069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1885853" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Whateverwhocares"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757007.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Whateverwhocares" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1885853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1885853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757007">Whateverwhocares</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-24">07/24/23 08:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Synthetic, feminine leaning, citric musk. The orange note doesnt smell as crisp and juicy as Id like. Instead, its like an orange thats been sitting out for a while. However its rounded out with a little bit of nuance. I think its not very good and would only work under certain circumstances. Also, longevity and projection are severely lacking.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1885853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1885853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1885745" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Though I like this, this doesnt explain the 235 that it is and I agree that too synthetic and sometimes harsh to my nose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1885745"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1885745#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I recently tried a handful of Louis Vuitton fragrances and California Dream was my least favorite. I can understand what was trying to be accomplished, so maybe it just didn't work with my body chemistry, but I found the musk to be pretty sour &amp; bitter. It was not pleasant and definitely not well blended. I get the similarities to Light Blue in the opening, but once she dries down she becomes more potent, and screechy. The scent profile itself isn't anything groundbreaking either. I would save your coins on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1881632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1881632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832011" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fruity, fresh all day like a mandarin lime vibe.  Love it for my summer scent, going out to the beach with my coconut sun tan lotion is   .</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1831200"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1831200#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1823232" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1823232" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="misspierogi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733502"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="misspierogi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1823232ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1823232" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733502">misspierogi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-02">05/02/23 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells exactly like the old VS Pink Fresh &amp; Clean body mist but a bit more elevated, with noticeably better ingredients, not as cheap-smelling, and with a stronger orangey citrus note. I used to where F&amp;C all the time in middle school, so I do like this scent, but it doesn't feel as unique as it should for the price point. It's just something that's been done before and I have higher expectations for LV.  <br />
<br />
It leans feminine on me, but I can see it being unisex so I don't think that really matters- I almost think I'd prefer it on men than myself. It's definitely a fresh but warm summer scent- the musk makes it feel like a skin scent from start to finish. This isn't the type of fragrance to draw attention, but you will still smell good. Very casual, not a date night or otherwise formal fragrance. Will pass on buying FS, but if you don't mind spending the money and want something to throw on for a beachy vacation this will do the trick.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1823232"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1823232#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love the citrus &amp; pear with the musk. I smelt it 5-10 times before I convinced myself to buy a bottle because it is super expensive. But I would definitely buy it again, even at that price. My boyfriend absolutely loves it on me too. A great date night perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1816470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1816470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1788278" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1788278" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Stwmylos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1207348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1207348.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Stwmylos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1788278ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1788278" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88); It has a citric accord that gives it a cleaning product-like character.<br />
It also leans more to the feminine side of things.<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1788278"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1788278#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1787685" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1787685" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Clauder13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311785"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311785.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Clauder13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1787685ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1787685" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311785">Clauder13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-19">03/19/23 18:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a cute fragrance.<br />
Citrus and a slight fruity touch with musk.<br />
Really calm, comforting and simple, this is the stuff to wear when you don't feel like wearing anything in the summer time, you'll be really relaxed while wearing this.<br />
Longevity is around 5-6 hours which is perfectly fine for a fresh scent.<br />
Unisex, anyone can wear this.<br />
I love this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1787685"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1787685#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1771902" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1771902" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MAKSTR"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345653"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1345653.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MAKSTR" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Wulong-Cha-30567.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30567.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wulng Ch"title="Wulng Ch"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1771902ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1771902" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1345653">MAKSTR</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-28">02/28/23 23:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Keep this in your Maybach, apply just before getting out for that business lunch in summer seaside location and you're done. Good for 2hr meeting.<br />
<br />
Scent 8/10<br />
Longevity 4/10<br />
Sillage 5/10<br />
Value 2/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1771902"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1771902#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1704179" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19867">aqua76239</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-07">12/07/22 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance been hyped it so much and i don't understand why. Its the most average citrus unisex scent. I mean it smells good enough if you like that sort of a fragrance but its so NOT worth a steep price tag or hype</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1704179"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1704179#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1694618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1694618" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hannyhanny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1521933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hannyhanny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1694618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1694618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521933">Hannyhanny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-23">11/23/22 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So disappointed with this, does not lean feminine whatsoever. Beautiful bottle but I just can't with the contents... Overpriced aftershave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1694618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1694618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1662139" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1662139" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="dabeyondobsessedemperor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1582152.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="dabeyondobsessedemperor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Black-Tie-57925.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57925.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Tie"title="Black Tie"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1662139ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1662139" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1582152">dabeyondobsessedemperor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-08">10/08/22 23:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a decent unisex summer scent, though in my opinion it leans feminine. Honestly speaking, the performance isn't great, at least not for the prices you're paying at Louis Vuitton. It's ironic that it's called California Dream, because to me the opening smells almost exactly like the huge lobby at the Conrad hotel in Downtown Manhattan. It's got that hotel feel throughout, but on my skin, the drydown smells like--and this will sound really odd--but one of the renditions of Chanel No. 5. As nice of a scent No. 5 is, as a guy who also happens to be on the younger side, it just doesn't suit my skin. However, only the drydown of California Dream smells like No. 5, so it's still fine for me. I just don't see getting as much use out of it as there is inside the bottle, so I've stowed it away to give to my relative who loves to collect as many perfumes as she can get her hands on. Plus, I still have a sample size in my dresser, so if I ever long for that exact scent, I can put it on. <br />
<br />
Don't get me wrong, I do really like and appreciate the scent profile of California Dream. I just think it suits others better than me. And it doesn't discredit the talent of Louis Vuitton's parfumiers, as I still truly enjoy Meteore and find it so pleasant, well-crafted and well-tailored to my skin that I'm going to make it a staple for my summer collection next year.<br />
<br />
SCORE: 83%</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1662139"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1662139#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1660112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1660112" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Arsenal Till I Die"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.866507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Arsenal Till I Die" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1660112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1660112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/866507">Arsenal Till I Die</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-06">10/06/22 05:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bottle looks so damn good and the scent is very damn nice, totally unisex and more masculine IMO even though I see so many people in the reviews say otherwise  so many other fragrances that lean way more feminine and this has no characteristics of a feminine fragrance at all. Kills Le labo Another 13. Its citrus, musky fresh and just really pleasant overall. A good way I like to test fragrances is to spray them on the back of my hand before bed and see if its still there the next morning and this was very present still 8 hours later!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1660112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1660112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1641037" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1641037" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RiversideNotes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1462609.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RiversideNotes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1641037ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1641037" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1462609">RiversideNotes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-08">09/08/22 13:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>California Dream is a solid fragrance. I dont find it the most pleasing, to my nose, of this line. I prefer Noveau Monde, Orage, and Afternoon Swim. <br />
<br />
I find the Ambrette Musk and Musk in California Dream to be a little synthetic. It immediately brought Diptyques Fleur de Peau to mind. They both share the musks. Fleur de Peau has bergamot and Cali Dream has orange, but theyre very similar. Also, if you love this fragrance, Id suggest trying Fleur de Peau to save roughly $70 USD versus the rather expensive Cali Dream. <br />
<br />
The citrus does stand out. For the price point, it doesnt have much longevity. I sprayed it on my body immediately after showering and applying lotion. I was able to get about 4-5 hours out of it. <br />
<br />
It may lean a little feminine, but I never think that matters. Folks should wear what they like. As a man, I wore it comfortably. I think the musk would really do wonders on a woman, but I am no fan of musk fragrances with my body oils, personally.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1641037"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1641037#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1633417" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1633417" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RobynCrabtree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1550058"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1550058.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RobynCrabtree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lancome/La-Nuit-Tresor-Le-Parfum-89120.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89120.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Nuit Trsor Le Parfum"title="La Nuit Trsor Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1633417ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1633417" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1550058">RobynCrabtree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-28">08/28/22 21:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Begins with a cheery citrus opening, then mellows out to something beachy I can't place in the notes - but it reminded me a lot of D&amp;G Light Blue. It smells fresh, young, and fun. I think this would be a great fit for 20's to maybe early 30 year olds. Ultimately, I enjoyed this fragrance and think it would be perfect for summer days near the beach, but I wasn't impressed with performance at that price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1633417"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1633417#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1623575" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1623575" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="feruza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202405"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1202405.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="feruza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Not-A-Perfume-Superdose-56679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.56679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Not A Perfume Superdose"title="Not A Perfume Superdose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1623575ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1623575" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1202405">feruza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-14">08/14/22 11:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells to me just like Escentric Molecule 01+Mandarine. But California Dreams little rich with ingridients.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1623575"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1623575#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1571218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1571218" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="OneGoodScent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486126"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="OneGoodScent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Les-Sables-Roses-55040.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.55040.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Les Sables Roses"title="Les Sables Roses"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1571218ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1571218" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1486126">OneGoodScent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-25">05/25/22 22:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Lots of citrus right away, but the citrus dissipates within moments. The musk comes through, almost a peppery scent. A dry mandarin note lingers, and it's quiet nice. I get light hints of clean ocean salt, maybe that's just from my pH mixed with the fragrance's musk. There is something sharp and metallic about this scent. I can see this really reacting better in the sun, with the heat opposed to my cafe runs and office tasks. Not a offending fragrance and office friendly as this doesn't roam far from my skin. Like usual with Louis Vuitton, the bottle is gorgeous and the sunrise colourway is a beautiful touch that doesn't deter from LV's already stellar packaging.  <br />
<br />
A good scent from LV but not my favorite. I can see this being a young, 20-something someone's go to scent. It's sexy and attractive but lacking maturity and complexity. I've heard that some people consider this "dated" as a scent profile, but I would disagree. I think this is solid fragrance that would float so well off the right person on a bar patio in the middle of the summer, but unfortunately that person is not me.<br />
<br />
Packaging: 10/10<br />
Price: 8/10<br />
Scent: 8/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1571218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1571218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1563786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1563786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaContessina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaContessina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barnia"title="Barnia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1563786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1563786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645">LaContessina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-14">05/14/22 10:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a summer /hot weather fragrance.<br />
 Got this months ago and i dismissed it as i couldn't stand it, a super sweet mandarine peel concoction with a salty note ending in musc... all very similar to Reveal by Calvin Klein.<br />
Fast forward to today, 27 C, i sprayed liberally without thinking too much- i was dashing off for errands, so nothing important nor complicated. <br />
Well.. it's indeed much nicer than i could remember. It blooms in hot weather. <br />
Still a beachy sort of thing  (no suntan lotion, no no)  but sweet and still reminds me of Reveal but CD is subtler and softer. <br />
The salty note (like sea water mist ) is very present and mixes with a green, algae like note. I am remined of Corallium by Carthusia (i own that one as well)<br />
Lasts for hours. <br />
Nice one but...not full bottle worth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1563786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1563786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1529209" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
