padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/52414">I&lt;3Perfume</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-04-04">04/04/20 14:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm always curious to see what Los Angeles smells to a perfumer. I'm from LA and sadly have smelled many interpretations but none ever capture it right. Honestly the smell of LA (whether people wanna admit it or not) is Viva La Juicy, Kai and a little splash of Light Blue by D&amp;G. I know that doesnt sound exciting but it is the smell here. So I hope they capture or right.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1160904"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1160904#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>

Im more of a coffee guy but I like this. Dry down segues into more of a creamy floral orange, coming a bit away from the intense citrusy top which is nice. Its classy and likable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1891069"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1891069#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1816470" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love the citrus &amp; pear with the musk. I smelt it 5-10 times before I convinced myself to buy a bottle because it is super expensive. But I would definitely buy it again, even at that price. My boyfriend absolutely loves it on me too. A great date night perfume!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1816470"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1816470#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1315920" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1315920" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Esna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.130358.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Esna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Headspace/Kirsch-Headspace-86159.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.86159.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Kirsch Headspace"title="Kirsch Headspace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1315920ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1315920" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/130358">Esna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-03-29">03/29/21 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super clean expensive soap. The fruityness isn't from fresh fruit but more of an icy classic push up Flinstones sherbet in the hot sun.  <br />
<br />
It immediately reminded me of an old polaroid that I have of myself back in 1989. Im in a ranch in a small west Texas town. Im freshly bathed and my hair smells like pink bubble gum from Mr. Bubble Bath. Im wearing a shiny blue bathing suit. The hot sun glistening on my skin as I sit on the trunk of my rich aunts shiny new brown Cadillac. She brings me a glass of cold blue raspberry koolaid as Im getting ready to play with the water hose.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1315920"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1315920#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1183020" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1183020" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HungarianGenius"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195937"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1195937.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HungarianGenius" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-Eau-Givree-72439.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72439.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"title="Terre d'Hermes Eau Givree"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1183020ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1183020" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1195937">HungarianGenius</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-06-01">06/01/20 17:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The benzoin, ambrette, musk and pear notes had me expecting something in the direction of Another 13, which this definitely isn't..<br />
<br />
Its a photorealistic mandarin through and through, this aspect is very impressive. Its like the whole process of picking up a mandarin, smelling it, breaking into its rind then peeling it, and finally eating its juicy flesh but played out over a 6 hour drydown. The musk is the other major note, the pear is noticeable, the ambrette and benzoin not so much.<br />
California Dream definitely belongs in the Les Colognes collection, so if you are expecting something more complex with interesting development, this unfortunately isn't it.<br />
The bottle is just gorgeous and almost made me blind buy, fortunately i sampled first and im glad i did as i was looking for something more than a super juicy citrus musk.<br />
<br />
I will revisit it in summer as im sure i will appreciate it a whole lot more.<br />
<br />
Longevity is impressive for what it is, projection is low-average, perhaps it will pop better in heat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1183020"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1183020#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1329855" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1329855" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="silkyb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318714"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1318714.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="silkyb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1329855ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1329855" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318714">silkyb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-04-21">04/21/21 21:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Jacques Cavallier has this incredible talent taking notes that would usually be sharp and making them soft and round. It's a beautiful signature he's given to LV. California Dream is everything I hoped it would be. On the initial spritz you get the beautiful rounded and soft Mandarin orange. Once it starts to gently dry down, that soft musk comes into play and lingers dancing around your skin. In my honest, humble opinion, it's my favorite from LV. It really, really reminds me of dusk on the California beaches or driving down PCH with the windows down. It has just the right amount of sillage and marvelous longevity. It even passed my sweater test. I smelled it the next day. Someone already asked what I was wearing because it smelled amazing. Happy spritzing! -Silky</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1329855"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1329855#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="60388" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1181752" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1181752" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Essarai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1236293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Essarai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68960.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spell On You"title="Spell On You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1181752ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1181752" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236293">Essarai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-05-29">05/29/20 09:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this and was excited to experience the story.  Instant mandarin top notes hurriedly usher you in and leave you in the hands of musky ambrette and cotton candy bezoin who step in and finish the journey.  This is a musk dominant fragrance.<br />
<br />
For me, the four Summer Fragrances from LV tell a story.  Sun Song cheerfully starts the day with neroli and bergamot happiness leading to a meditation in the Cactus Garden at the height of noon, where lime and mate tea contemplate the heat.  Afternoon Swim is literally that perfect splash that refreshes you during siesta time and finally, California Dream finishes the day, enveloping you in a cozy, cashmere throw as the summer sun sets on the waters.<br />
<br />
As a male in my 30s, I definitely feel like California Dream leans the most feminine out of the four unisex perfumes in the summer LV collection.  The ambrette and benzoin make this perfume feel less energetic than Sun Song which has a musk base note.  If you dont like a musk predominant fragrance, this is not the one for you.<br />
<br />
Wouldn't blind buy this one, it's personally my least favorite of the four summer EDPs as Im not a big musk fan.  Sillage is great, definitely dances around the room and it has lasted 6-8 hours on dry skin. Get a sample and see if you relate to it first.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1181752"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1181752#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1694618" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1694618" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Hannyhanny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521933"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1521933.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Hannyhanny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kayali-Fragrances/Yum-Boujee-Marshmallow-81-99254.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.99254.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"title="Yum Boujee Marshmallow | 81"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1694618ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1694618" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1521933">Hannyhanny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-23">11/23/22 10:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So disappointed with this, does not lean feminine whatsoever. Beautiful bottle but I just can't with the contents... Overpriced aftershave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1694618"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1694618#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1195442" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1195442" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mjkpecwt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/354513"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.354513.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mjkpecwt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Galion/Chypre-2020-63459.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63459.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chypre (2020)"title="Chypre (2020)"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1195442ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1195442" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/354513">mjkpecwt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-07-03">07/03/20 03:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An expensive cologne for the rich.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1195442"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1195442#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1881632" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1881632" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xela_529"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1545982.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xela_529" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ella-K-Parfums/Melodie-D-Altai-48471.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48471.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Melodie D'Altai"title="Melodie D'Altai"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1881632ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1881632" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1545982">Xela_529</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-18">07/18/23 15:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I recently tried a handful of Louis Vuitton fragrances and California Dream was my least favorite. I can understand what was trying to be accomplished, so maybe it just didn't work with my body chemistry, but I found the musk to be pretty sour &amp; bitter. It was not pleasant and definitely not well blended. I get the similarities to Light Blue in the opening, but once she dries down she becomes more potent, and screechy. The scent profile itself isn't anything groundbreaking either. I would save your coins on this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="60388"comment_id="1881632"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/California-Dream-60388.html?ccid=1881632#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="60388" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="search-reviews"><search-perfume-reviews :perfume_id="60388":random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]"></search-perfume-reviews></div></div><foundation-tabs></foundation-tabs></reviews-wrapper></div><perfume-shortcut-menu :perfume_id="60388" when-hidden="#toptop"></perfume-shortcut-menu><initialize-status-data></initialize-status-data><div class="cell small-12"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_footer -->

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x250" id="fragranticacom_perfume_mrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
        
        <div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">
        <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/m.24603.jpg" style="width: 60px; height: 64px; margin-right: 0.5em; flex-shrink: 0"/>
        <a href="/perfume/Papillon-Artisan-Perfumes/Tobacco-Rose-24603.html#cc2371764"><span class="link-span"></span>
            <span class="brand">Papillon Artisan Perfumes</span><br>            <span class="ztworowseclipse">Tobacco Rose</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="I get green, dewy rose and no tobacco, which is exactly the kind of profile I like. Quite straightforward and unlike other creations from this house. A little bit soapy which adds the right amount of vintage vibes. It transports me to what I imagine to be early spring in the English countryside,...">by
            <em>rieestyle</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.242874.jpg"

    let userNoteBookLangVar = {
        placeholder:"Your private note up to 255 characters long.",

    }

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
